home.title: GreenEye Foundation | Home
home.description: GreenEye Foundation - Making the planet greener through community-driven plantation and environmental care.
home.cta: Join our mission to plant trees and protect the planet.

hero.description: Join our mission to combat climate change through massive tree plantation drives and environmental conservation initiatives across the globe.

blog.seoDescription: Read the latest news and stories from GreenEye.
blog.pageSubtitle: Read the latest news and stories from GreenEye.
blog.defaultMetaDescription: Read the latest blog from GreenEye.

about.seoDescription: Learn about GreenEye and our mission.
about.pageSubtitle: Learn about GreenEye and our mission.
about.visionText: To create a world where every community has access to clean air, green spaces, and a sustainable environment through massive reforestation efforts and environmental education.
about.impactText: Since our founding, we've planted over 50,000 trees, educated thousands of community members about environmental conservation, and established sustainable green practices in urban and rural areas.
about.featurePlantationText: Large-scale plantation drives in deforested areas
about.featureEducationText: Environmental awareness programs for all ages

programs.seoDescription: Explore our reforestation, education, and community initiatives. Join GreenEye's programs for a greener future.
programs.pageSubtitle: Explore our reforestation, education, and community initiatives.

volunteer.seoDescription: Become part of a movement for a greener planet. Sign up today to volunteer with GreenEye.
volunteer.pageSubtitle: Become part of a movement for a greener planet. Sign up today!

impact.statTreesDesc: Across 25 cities in the last 3 years
impact.heading: Creating Lasting Change
impact.blurb: Every tree we plant contributes to cleaner air, reduced carbon footprint, and biodiversity conservation. Our strategic approach ensures maximum environmental benefit through:
impact.listNative: Native species selection for optimal growth

contact.seoDescription: We're here to answer your questions and welcome your feedback. Reach out to GreenEye for any inquiries or support.
contact.pageSubtitle: We're here to answer your questions and welcome your feedback.
contact.successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully! We will get back to you soon.

programsSection.urbanReforestationDesc: Transforming concrete jungles into green oases through strategic tree plantation in urban areas, parks, and abandoned lots.
programsSection.communityDrivesDesc: Engaging local communities in large-scale plantation activities to create awareness and foster environmental stewardship.
programsSection.schoolProgramsDesc: Educating the next generation through hands-on environmental programs in schools and educational institutions.

cookiesPolicy.title: Cookies Policy
cookiesPolicy.intro: does not use cookies on its website
cookiesPolicy.noTrackingText: We respect your privacy and do not track your behavior or usage across the website using cookies.
cookiesPolicy.thirdPartyText: Since we do not use third-party services like analytics or advertising, there are no external cookies installed via our platform.
cookiesPolicy.changesText: We may update this Cookies Policy if our practices change. You will be notified on this page.
cookiesPolicy.contactText: For any questions regarding our Cookies Policy, you may contact us at:

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro2: we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect the personal information you provide through our website.
privacyPolicy.infoCollectedText: We collect this information through our contact and inquiry forms.
privacyPolicy.howWeUseText: Your data is used only to contact you regarding your inquiry or to respond to your messages. We do not share, sell, or rent your information with any third party.
privacyPolicy.cookiesText: Our website does not use cookies or any third-party tracking services.
privacyPolicy.dataProtectionText: We follow standard data protection practices to ensure your information remains secure. However, no method of internet transmission is 100% secure.
privacyPolicy.contactText: If you have any questions about our privacy policy, you can contact us:

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.welcome: Welcome to GreenEye. By accessing our website (
termsOfService.agree: ) you agree to these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully.
termsOfService.useText: This website is intended to provide information about our environmental efforts and allow users to connect with us. You agree not to misuse the site or post any harmful, illegal, or offensive content.
termsOfService.userDataText: By submitting forms on our website, you agree to provide accurate information. You are solely responsible for the data you submit.
termsOfService.ownershipText: All content on this website, including text, images, and logos, are the property of GreenEye unless stated otherwise. Unauthorized use is prohibited.
termsOfService.changesText: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Updates will be posted on this page with a revised date.
termsOfService.contactText: For any questions regarding these terms, you can contact:
